title: I am not a big reader still wanted to have a refreshing book to read, rather motivational. Suggest one? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are not a big reader, then why not try short stories. Pick up Ruskin Bond. Try to read books my R. K. Narayan, like Malgudi Days or Talkative Man. Books by Paolo Coelho, not big, easy on eyes and mind. I will recommend Palace of Illusions by Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni. Try this one.

I would recommend to read Fountainhead by Ayn Rand, Its an amazing book accumulating philosophical concepts with tantalizing fictional story. Story revolves around individualist who faces many challenges in the path because of his thought process.
